EmailTemplate.subject: NCS with The Challenge - Essential Information action required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative. Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
We hope you are having a great spring and are looking forward to a fantastic summer working on NCS with the Challenge.
The Essential Information section of our Staffing Website is now available to use. Please log in to the Staffing Website to see what information we now require from you.
Completing this section ensures we have all the necessary information to run a safe programme and pay you for your role. Some sections will contain information you have previously submitted to us, please check these sections to ensure we have the correct information.
All parts of the Essential Information section need to be completed before you can work with us on the program. The Staffing Website FAQs have lots more information if you are unsure about what you need to do.
What do you have to do?
Please log into the staffing website and update all the sections marked 'incomplete’.
You can also review some sections marked as ‘submitted’ to check the information is correct.
Any section which says ‘complete’ does not require any further input from you.
Click here to go to the Staffing Website https://staffing.the-challenge.org
If you have forgotten your password, please request this via the Staffing Website on the login page. Your username is your email address.
Submitting your availability
If you have not already done so, please submit your availability, under the section “Choosing when I can work". Without your availability we cannot confirm a work schedule for you.
We are looking forward to working with you on NCS with The Challenge. We still have some roles to fill so please tell your friends and colleagues about us!
Best Wishes,
The Challenge
Follow us on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn
